Interface AdCategoryDAO

extends BaseDAO<AdCategory>, InsertableDAO<AdCategory>, UpdatableDAO<AdCategory>, DeletableDAO<AdCategory>

      • search

        java.util.List<AdCategory> search(AdCategoryQuery queryParameters)
                                  throws DaoException
        Returns a List containing Categories related parameters. If no Category can be found, returns an empty List. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException. All returned categories should have fetched the parent and children relationships
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • searchLeafAdCategories

        java.util.List<AdCategory> searchLeafAdCategories(AdCategoryQuery query)
                                                  throws DaoException
        Returns a List containing all leaf Categories. If no Category can be found, returns an empty List.
        Throws:
        DaoException
